title: Gafford out with knee sprain as Mavs' depth thins
description: Dallas Mavericks center Daniel Gafford suffered a right knee sprain and will be reevaluated within two weeks, the team announced Tuesday.

title: Raps' Ingram agrees to 3-year, $120M extension
description: New Toronto Raptors star Brandon Ingram has agreed to a three-year, $120 million contract extension with the franchise, including a player option.
author: Shams Charania and Bobby Marks

title: Man City's lack of belief and ageing team exposed by ruthless Real Madrid
description: Manchester City's lack of belief and ageing squad is exposed by ruthless Real Madrid to leave their Champions League hopes in danger, writes BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty

title: From world's best to Wales' worst - Gatland shows danger of going back
description: From world's best to Wales' worst, Warren Gatland may have proved why you should never go back as his second stint as Wales head coach ends.

title: Chelsea striker Kerr cleared of racial harassment
description: Chelsea striker Sam Kerr has been cleared of causing racially aggravated harassment after calling a Metropolitan Police officer "stupid and white".

title: Kelly still in frame for Euro 2025 despite England squad omission
description: England manager Sarina Wiegman says Chloe Kelly's hopes of playing at Euro 2025 are not over after the Arsenal loanee was left out of the latest Lionesses squad to face Portugal and Spain.
